## Evaluation Phase
We are currently in the pre-evaluation phase. This involves

  - Gathering a team
  - Thinking about potential programs
  - Creating a prospectus

For a look at what to consider when choosing teammates, take a look at [a] [Manager's guide to evaluation](https://www.betterevaluation.org/en/managers_guide){target="_blank"} by *Jane Davidson*.
